name: Saba
description:
You are lost and away from your family, you are weak and defenseless. You must use everything in the environment to get to the end. In this adventure, you will meet Saba, a strange animal that still seems friendly. Will you find your family with your new companion? Only you can decide
This is a School project made in a group of 4
Maxime Taoufik - Programmation & integration
Clara Toussaint - Graphism & Level Design
Arnaud Forgues - Animation, SFX
Antoine Guillemot - Level Design & Production management
